Title: Can't Fix Crazy
Writer: Jenji Kohan (creator), Tara Herrmann, Jenji Kohan, Piper Kerman (book)
Actors: Taylor Schilling, Laura Prepon, Michael Harney, Michelle Hurst
Plot: Alex makes a final decision about Piper and Larry finally decides what will happen to Piper after meeting Alex for the first time. Red's plan to retrieve her kitchen goes awry. Piper is forced to stand up to another inmate.
